sourcesContent:
<form (submit)="onSubmit()">
  <label>
    First Name:
    <input type="text" name="firstName" [(ngModel)]="firstName" required>
  </label>

  <label>
    Last Name:
    <input type="text" name="lastName" [(ngModel)]="lastName" required>
  </label>

  <label>
    Email:
    <input type="email" name="email" [(ngModel)]="email" required>
  </label>

  <label>
    Date of Birth:
    <input type="date" name="dob" [(ngModel)]="dob" required>
  </label>

  <label>
    Phone:
    <input type="tel" name="phone" [(ngModel)]="phone" required>
  </label>

  <label>
    Hobby:
    <input type="text" name="hobby" [(ngModel)]="hobby" required>
  </label>

  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
</form>
